2006890.name: Age of Conquest IV - All Maps & Modding
2006890.description:
This DLC unlocks all the maps for Age of Conquest. Maps are added and updated regularly, so instead of adding them to the DLC itself, they are downloaded from within the game. In particular, the DLC give access to the following.

  • All the maps with their scenarios (including player-modded maps).
  • Includes current and upcoming maps that are not released yet. Currently, 260+ maps are available.
  • Can be used in single player or multiplayer games including hotseat games.
  • Allows uploading your map for others to play.
  • No login is required to download the maps from within the game (you need internet still).
  • No DRM: you can play offline (make sure you download the maps beforehand!).
  • WARNING: the DLC only works via Steam. If you want to play cross-platform, get the corresponding In-App purchase "All Maps & Modding" and it will work on other devices also.

IMPORTANT: if you already purchased "All Maps & Modding" within the game, you do NOT need to buy the DLC also. Both are the same. The game will prevent you from purchasing the DLC from within the game. It's not possible to do so on the DLC web page however. That said, there will a warning in-game if it finds you have it twice telling you to get a refund.
2006890.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 土耳其语*, 俄语*, 韩语*, 丹麦语*, 芬兰语*, 希腊语*, 匈牙利语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 罗马尼亚语*, 日语*, 简体中文*, 乌克兰语*, 阿拉伯语*, 捷克语*, 挪威语*, 泰语*, 繁体中文*, 保加利亚语*, 荷兰语*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*, 瑞典语*, 越南语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
